works.name: This portfolio
works.description: This single-page app, developed with vue.js and taking special care about the design.

works.name: My perillin Noise
works.description: My approach to creating pseudo-random noise images. Originally it was an approach to create procedural terrains for unity. Written in c# with threading optimizations.

works.name: Markov Chain Twitter
works.description: With machine learning it learns from user tweets and publish random tweets with the leanguage learnt.

works.name: Cubolores (GameJam UPV)
works.description: Winner game developed in a jam of 34 hours for the Polytechnic University of Valencia. We used unity as engine and blender 3D to make the assets. A video will be available soon.

works.name: Cards Against Humanity
works.description: My most ambitious project. It is a mobile multiplayer game developed for IOs and android. It will be launched this summer.

works.name: My electron diary
works.description: Unfinished project, where I tried to make a personal diary application using Vue

works.name: Todo-list app
works.description: Single-page application developing the typical to-do list.
